title: Thomas the tank engine & friends
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Puppet films
description: Thomas the Tank Engine and his friends get involved in a number of exciting adventures. Based on the stories by Rev. W Awdry, these stories are delightfully narrated by Ringo Starr or Michael Angelis.
